Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26235946]Gram-positive bacteria :Bacillus subtilis (MIC>200 μg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>200 μg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermis (MIC>200 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli (MIC>200 μg/ml), Shigella dysentariae (MIC>200 μg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC>200 μg/ml), Klebsiella pneumonia (MIC>200 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>200 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26235946] <1% hemolysis at 12.5 μM , <1% hemolysis at 25 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of doubly-stapled alanine/lysine-based peptides
Literature.Author: Thuy T. T. Dinh , Do-Hee Kim , Huy X. Luong  , Bong-Jin Lee , Young-Woo Kim
